attributes.action: make Rossendale Council provide "FREE" refuse wheelie bins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently found myself being charged for a new green wheelie bin, £22.00, after it was stolen! This is Rossendale Council.If i had broken the bin myself..fair enough! But it was stolen! Now it seems, if i do not pay for a new bin, and i place my rubbish outside in bags, i could be prosecuted for fly-tipping as they will not be collected! Rossendale is so big on Recycling, the least they could do is supply/replace bins at no charge..if only once, or at least use a little discretion and common sense!
